title: Who Is Peter Mandelson, the UK Ex-Ambassador Fired Over His Epstein Ties?
summary_full: The former British ambassador to the United States was arrested on Monday, months after being fired over his ties to Jeffrey Epstein, the convicted sex offender.
summary_public: The former British ambassador to the United States was arrested on Monday, months after being fired over his ties to Jeffrey Epstein, the convicted sex offender.

GB.label: negative
GB.evidence: UK Ex-Ambassador Fired Over His Epstein Ties
